titleStmt.title: The guide vnto true blessednesse. Or, A body of the doctrine of the Scriptures, directing man to the sauing knowledge of God. Collected by Sam. Crooke
titleStmt.author: Crook, Samuel, 1575-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Pindley, for Nathaniell Butter, and are to be sold at his shop neere S. Austins gate, at the signe of the Pyed Bull,

notesStmt.note: In the form of a catechism.
Usually bound with the author's: A briefe direction to true happinesse.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere S. Austins gate, at the signe of the Pyed Bull
